strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Steamy Copyright 2009 Ron Huang Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
This gadget allows you to check out attrative people and rate them. The data are collected from http://www.hotornot.com/
The source code for this gadget is located at http://github.com/ronhuang/steamy
strings.strImageToolTip: Click on the radio buttons above to vote.
strings.strOpenToolTip: Opens this person's page with browser.
strings.strRatingToolTip: The average rating others gave to this person.
